About Us
Cafe Americano is part of the
V&E Restaurant Group
brand of restaurants. Based in Miami with locations in Miami, Las Vegas and beyond, our innovative collection of restaurants and bars offers creative cuisine and craft cocktails with superior service.
Latest News
Things To Do At Caesars Palace Las Vegas
Cafe Americano, an all-day diner based in Las Vegas, has opened its first Miami-area location inside the Hotel Victor on Ocean Drive in South Beach.
Read More »
October 10, 2023
Cafe Americano Debuts First Miami Location on Ocean Drive
Cafe Americano, an all-day diner based in Las Vegas, has opened its first Miami-area location inside the Hotel Victor on Ocean Drive in South Beach.
Read More »
January 7, 2021
A Sin City Favorite Arrives in Miami
Cafe Americano will debut its first Florida locations at Hotel Victor and the Redbury Miami Beach in January
Read More »
January 5, 2021
This 24-hour Las Vegas spot just opened its first East Coast location on Miami Beach
A Las Vegas staple is coming to South Beach times two.
Cafe Americano Ocean Drive, the first East Coast location for the brand, is now open at the Hotel Victor in Miami Beach. A second location will open at the Redbury Miami Beach on Collins Avenue in January.
Read More »
January 5, 2021
Group Dining near The Ice Rink at The Cosmopolitan
Enjoy a timeless holiday-season pastime—and combine it with some note-perfect American comfort food—in the Entertainment Capital of the World: Take to the skating rink at The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas and tuck into great 24-7 eats at Cafe Americano, just a few minutes away!
Read More »
November 26, 2019
American Restaurant for Holiday Shopping in Las Vegas
Chockablock with retail outfits of every description—from big-name department stores and international brands to one-of-a-kind local boutiques—Las Vegas is one of the best destinations in the country for holiday shopping, bar none.
Read More »
November 26, 2019
